properties.entry: prefix gephi:<http://gephi.org/> CONSTRUCT{ ?film gephi:label ?title . ?film gephi:category "film" . ?director gephi:category "director" . ?actor gephi:category "actor" . ?film <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/director> ?director . ?film <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?actor } WHERE { ?film rdfs:label ?title . ?film <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/director> ?director . ?film <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?actor FILTER(lang(?title)="en") } LIMIT 10000
